INSOMNEA art

Hi, nice to meet you! I'm Annie

I've been drawing for as long as I can remember (and hold a pencil). I started drawing digitally when I was 16 years old and painting only a few years later. Being creative is my outlet for my energy and whatever is on my mind.

For a long time I wanted to become a painter or a concept artist for video games. Now I do both! I love creating character concepts but I also still enjoy analogue work. That's why you'll find both here on my website. I am continuing my education in character concept art and still work with a brush in front of the canvas. At the moment I'm studying Digital Ideation at Hochschule Luzern to pursue my dream of becoming a concept artist.

Whether your beloved furry friend has passed away or you would just like to show them how much you love them, I would love to be the artist of your artwork. Bringing joy to others through my work makes me happier than anything else. I'm an animal lover myself and have had many different pets throughout my life. From cats and dogs to guinea pigs and geckos to mantises and even a tarantula.

I work digitally with Krita or Rebelle and Blender. Analogously, I mainly work with acrylic paints but occasionally also with oil.

Thank you for visiting my little corner of the internet.

For business inquiries, please send me an e-mail to insomnea@outlook.com.

Non est ad astra mollis e terris via
